title: I got a fedora

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Following in Lord Vvvortic's footsteps I have purchased myself a Fedora, of which I wear over my headphones whilst I play. 
In all seriousness I do, and I went on an 8 win streak when I did. My advice to get to challenjour, get a fedora.

replies.body: Ugh why can't i ban people here.
Why you gotta hate on My Fedora.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=I3vL5f1x,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-09T10:15:17.563+0000)
>
> Ugh why can't i ban people here.

There is a blacklist function in the FEK, if that's what you're talking about, assuming it's still useable idk.
Go brag about how awesome your life is thanks to your fedora to some gang bikers.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=I3vL5f1x,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-09T09:51:41.873+0000)
>
> Go brag about how awesome your life is thanks to your fedora to some gang bikers.

Well, "awesome" is a relative term.

One could feel awesome simply by having a nice meal that filled his stomach with a beer in his hand. But for some others, BMW heavy motors, big houses, fame and ladies are what satisfies the awesome benchmark.

Similarly, wear it when you're out too, that way you would win life as well.

EDIT: Are those Xbox and Playstation sitting over there on the drawer thingy? Man I wish I have spare money for them.
Yea they are, I got a whole different Living room as well, much bigger TV :D. Anyway I got the Ps3 of a website called Lockerz or whatever, it was ages ago.
